isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1991) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TEST PROCEDURES FOR 7.3 LITER DIESEL ENGINES - FUEL SYSTEM PRESSURES - CHECK FUEL RETURN PRESSURE. [U-HAUL APPLICATIONS ONLY]

svcproc.title: CHECK FUEL RETURN PRESSURE. [U-HAUL APPLICATIONS ONLY]

note.para: U-HAUL Applications differ only because they are equipped with a combination ful filter, heater and water seperator.

step1.para: Remove the existing fuel leak-off hose and attach a 0-15 psi pressure gauge on a tee fitting as shown in Figure 5.23.

note.para: The leak-off line must be connected to the continuous vent on the fuel filter header.

step1.para: Check pressure at rated speed, no load, with the transmission in neutral and accessories turned off.
If the pressure is within specifications (less than 2.0 psi), go to test D.
If the pressure is not within specifications, eliminate the restriction in the fuel return line and repeat test C "Check Fuel Return Pressure".
